title: Getting Started - Setting Up Your Environment
description: This section provides essential guidance for setting up your development environment, ensuring you have all the necessary tools and configurations to follow along with the book's practical exercises. A well-prepared environment is crucial for a smooth learning experience in the complex domain of humanoid robotics.
